values: A steep surface or place has a slope or angle that rises or falls sharply.
He rode his bike up the steep hill to reach the top.
n. 峭壁；浸渍 adj. 陡峭的；不合理的；夸大的；急剧升降的 vt. 泡；浸；使…充满 vi. 泡；沉浸
